com.Databaseproject.databaseProject

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Databaseproject.databaseProject.Table
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Table
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represent a table of a database
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructor and Description
      Table(String name, Database d1)
      Create a Table for Database and add it to its Database tables ArrayList.
